document_data.mainbody:
The Waiting Grave was a ballad composed by Dezsmra Langrafarl, Minstrel of Iriaebor in the late 14 century DR.
The ballad sang about heroes and treacherous villains. The Waiting Grave was recored in a collection of ballads by Dezsmra Langrafarl – A Minstrels Whimsy‎, a chapbook published in the .
